name: Dami Gojeh
instructions: heat oil in a pan, then saute onions for 3 minutes
Add tumeric, cayenne, and cumin to the pan; fry briefly
Add potatoes and cook for 5 minutes
Add tomatoes and cook for 2 minutes
Add rice and water, bring to boil, reduce heat, and let simmer for about 15 minutes
Serve with yogurt and fresh herbs (thyme or parsley)
